channel.title: Forum "bugs"
channel.description:
At the bottom it shows this [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/new_some.gif[/img] when that isn't the correct button(for the mopar theme?) [hr] Not sure if it happens to everyone but sometimes when I click on a board to go to that board index cause it said there was a new topic. It doesn't show there being a new topic(with the blue square thingy on the topic title or whatever) [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/english-utf8/new.gif[/img] I am using Google Chrome [hr] If you go to forum stats at the bottom it shows several people who are in the lead as topic starters yet they have 0 posts for whatever reason. That should be changed as they are obviously not in the lead any longer? [hr] If you go to your profile, go to group memberships there is one that says
View Archived Boards Allows you to view (read-only) the otherwise hidden, old boards that are no longer relevant
I am a member of this group yet as far as I know I don't see any? (Or at least it doesn't tell me this is a hidden board...)

item.title: Forum "bugs"
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:8, topic:518752”]Have you thought that maybe it was in the sub board? When you look on the main forum page, there are categories. Some of these have other boards withing them, like rs modeling board, it has a help/request board within it.[/quote]When it’s a sub board it makes the subboard be a darker blue on the index home.

[quote=“Ruby, post:6, topic:518752”]If you’re looking for the archived boards, they’re on moparisthebest.com.[/quote]Thank you Ruby did not know

Read full topic

item.title: Forum "bugs"
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Have you thought that maybe it was in the sub board? When you look on the main forum page, there are categories. Some of these have other boards withing them, like rs modeling board, it has a help/request board within it.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum "bugs"
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

If you’re looking for the archived boards, they’re on moparisthebest.com.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum "bugs"
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:4, topic:518752”]Saw this but never found any reason to say anything. Although this doesn’t affect the community as it is purely cosmetic (the first suggestion), I don’t see a reason as to not supporting it.
So I support.

As to your bottom statement, that just means that there are unread posts in that section, and not necessarily a new topic.[/quote]but that isn’t what that square is for.

If you go to the bottom of the homepage it says this

New Posts

Edit You misunderstand what I was saying sorry! I am saying exactly that. I sometimes get the new post alert on index home. I click the board index for that board and it doesn’t show the new image.

Edit #2: If you go to forum stats at the bottom it shows several people who are in the lead as topic starters yet they have 0 posts for whatever reason. That should be changed as they are obviously not in the lead any longer?

Edit #3: If you go to your profile, go to group memberships there is one that says

View Archived Boards Allows you to view (read-only) the otherwise hidden, old boards that are no longer relevant

I am a member of this group yet as far as I know I don’t see any? (Or at least it doesn’t tell me this is a hidden board…)

Read full topic

item.title: Forum "bugs"
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Saw this but never found any reason to say anything. Although this doesn’t affect the community as it is purely cosmetic (the first suggestion), I don’t see a reason as to not supporting it.
So I support.

As to your bottom statement, that just means that there are unread posts in that section, and not necessarily a new topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum "bugs"
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:2, topic:518752”]I haven’t ever noticed that, you must have a great attention to detail. Good find.[/quote]I got ISO Audit certified last month and ever since I look at stuff way too critical :s I sort of think it’s a curse sometimes.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Forum "bugs"
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

At the bottom it shows this

when that isn’t the correct button(for the mopar theme?)

[hr]

Not sure if it happens to everyone but sometimes when I click on a board to go to that board index cause it said there was a new topic. It doesn’t show there being a new topic(with the blue square thingy on the topic title or whatever)

I am using Google Chrome

[hr]

If you go to forum stats at the bottom it shows several people who are in the lead as topic starters yet they have 0 posts for whatever reason. That should be changed as they are obviously not in the lead any longer?

[hr]

If you go to your profile, go to group memberships there is one that says

View Archived Boards Allows you to view (read-only) the otherwise hidden, old boards that are no longer relevant

I am a member of this group yet as far as I know I don’t see any? (Or at least it doesn’t tell me this is a hidden board…)
